title: Trusting God with Your Adult Child, Part 2
itunes:author: Guest: Jodie Berndt
itunes:summary: Sometimes when you’re praying for your kids, you might find yourself telling God exactly how He should handle each situation, but John and Danny explain how prayers for your kids should be about God shaping them the way he wants. Receive the book Praying the Scriptures for Your Adult Children with your gift of any amount!
